p: The value of the second rate constant of the adsorption process (k 2) 6.92 × 10 −5 g mg −1 min −1 obtained assuming the model of pseudo-second order proves that the process of adsorption is much faster than of DOX adsorption on the carrier modified by Wang [ 43] (3.52 × 10 −8 g mg −1 min −1), however, it is much slower than that of adsorption of lysozyme [ 65] or curcumin [ 55] on MWCNTs modified in different ways.
